title: Thurgood Marshall College Fund
summary: Citi Foundation provided a $1 million grant to the Thurgood Marshall College Fund (TMCF) to launch the HBCU Career Incubator Program on 30 HBCU campuses. Over the next two years, this new initiative will provide 2,000 first-year HBCU students with the critical support they need to graduate and to pursue their chosen career paths.
tag-2: Citi Foundation provided a $1 million grant to the Thurgood Marshall College Fund (TMCF) to launch the HBCU Career Incubator Program on 30 HBCU campuses. Over the next two years, this new initiative will provide 2,000 first-year HBCU students with the critical support they need to graduate and to pursue their chosen career paths. TMCF will partner with 30 public HBCUs and will work with campus coordinators, career offices, faculty, and staff to engage selected students in a one-year multi-faceted professional development program.
